text: Ronivaldo Bernardo Sales (born 24 March 1989) is a Brazilian professional footballer. He plays as a forward for Blau-Weiß Linz. ==Club career== He started his career with Náutico Capibaribe in Brazil. In 2013 he came to Austria. He played for SV Kapfenberg in Austrias Second League. In 57 matches he scored 27 goals for Kapfenberg. In summer 2015 he went to FK Austria Wien in the Austrian Bundesliga.Due to severe injuries he could not play for the first team. After the recovery he played eight matches for the second team. From 2017 to 2020 he played for SC Austria Lustenau where he scored in 78 matches 68 goals. On 10 July 2020, he signed with Wacker Innsbruck. After the relegation of Wacker Innsbruck due to financial problems he went to Blau-Weiß Linz. ==Honours== Individual *Austria Lustenau Player of the Season: 2018–19, 2019–20 *Austrian Second League top scorer: 2018–19, 2019–20 *Austrian Cup top scorer: 2019–20 *Austrian Bundesliga top scorer: 2024-25 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1989 births Category:Association football forwards Category:Footballers from Ceará Category:FC Blau-Weiß Linz players
